name: Ghost Whisperer: Case 1 - A Brush with Death
name_original: Ghost Whisperer: Case 1 - A Brush with Death
description:
Ghost Whisperer: Case 1 - A Brush with Death is a game developed by Legacy Games. It came out on 19-04-2011. It was published by Legacy Interactive.
You can play Ghost Whisperer: Case 1 - A Brush with Death on PC.
